text: Turn around and find a crafting table.
You can use a crafting table to produce weapons
by using itens in your inventory. To open a
crafting table, just right-click on it.
Follow the diagram instruction below to craft a wooden axe.
Right-click on an item from your inventory and drag it to
the correct slot in the table. Once you finish placing the items
and the axe shows up on the screen, click on it and drag it to
the first slot of your main inventory (bottom slots).
Press OK when you are ready.
